message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.SD, cs.SOC. 

The paper deals with opinion dynamics in a networked system, which is a common topic in the field of social networks (cs.SOC). The use of self-appraisals and distributed evaluation suggests a focus on machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.MA). The convergence of the dynamical system implies a study of control theory (cs.SY) and systems and control (cs.SD). Finally, the use of a rooted digraph to describe the network topology suggests a focus on social influence (cs.SI).
